mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CNFR_HSTR ( CNFR_HSTR_ID, CNFR_HSTR_APP_DT, CNFR_HSTR_YN, CRS_INF_ID, USR_ID ) SELECT 'CNFR_HSTR-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LPAD(SEQ_CNFR_HSTR_PK.NEXTVAL, 6, '0'), SYSDATE, 'Y', CRS_INF_ID, USR_ID FROM ( SELECT AH.CRS_INF_ID, AH.USR_ID FROM APP_HSTR AH JOIN CRS_INF CI ON AH.CRS_INF_ID = CI.CRS_INF_ID WHERE CI.CRS_INF_DDLN_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY AH.CRS_INF_ID, AH.USR_ID HAVING COUNT(*) > ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CNCL_HSTR CH JOIN APP_HSTR AH2 ON CH.APP_HSTR_ID = AH2.APP_HSTR_ID WHERE AH2.CRS_INF_ID = AH.CRS_INF_ID AND AH2.USR_ID = AH.USR_ID ) ) AHX WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM CNFR_HSTR CH WHERE CH.CRS_INF_ID = AHX.CRS_INF_ID AND CH.USR_ID = AHX.USR_ID )
mapper.select: SELECT CH.CRS_INF_ID , CI.CRS_INF_NM , U.USR_ID , U.USR_NM , U.USR_ML , U.USR_PN , U.USR_ADRS , ( SELECT TO_CHAR(MAX(AH.APP_HSTR_RGST_DT), 'YYYY-MM-DD') FROM APP_HSTR AH WHERE AH.USR_ID = CH.USR_ID AND AH.CRS_INF_ID = CH.CRS_INF_ID ) AS APP_HSTR_RGST_DT FROM CNFR_HSTR CH INNER JOIN USR U ON CH.USR_ID = U.USR_ID INNER JOIN CRS_INF CI ON CH.CRS_INF_ID = CI.CRS_INF_ID WHERE CH.CRS_INF_ID = #{crsInfId} ORDER BY APP_HSTR_RGST_DT
